reviews.review_content:
This is the professor that you want to take. He is very funny and extremely interesting. I took the 3 hours EMBA course and he kept this class interesting and fun for the entire semester. He also knows his subject extremely well. The class gives him a standing ovation as the semester end. Guys, take this guy, you will not be dissapointed. 
Workload:
Case reading every week (don't need to turn in) One difficult final case.
